Author: Sebastien
Comment: Are you aware of blogware implementing RVW? <http://radio.weblogs.com/0110772/2003/11/04.html#a1229>

Author: Pip
Comment:
Ah, no I didn’t know about that! The [screenshots of how it works](http://www.blogger.com/r?http%3A%2F%2Fblog.blogware.com%2Fhurry%2F) look really great and are just what I’d like MT, Typepad, Blogger or WordPress to support natively!

I know that Alf wrote [an RVW plugin for MT](http://www.blogger.com/r?http%3A%2F%2Fwww.pmbrowser.info%2Fwiki.pl%3FRVW_Movable_Type_Plugin) but I don’t *think* it’s widely used. What’s really needed is for one of the tools above to take hold of this by the scruff of the neck and enable the RVW module in feeds – it’s not as if it would make anything incompatible – this is what namespaces are for!.

Author: Pip
Comment: Actually, looking through all the material, I did see it at the time (2003) but I’d forgotten all about it.
